ComicInfo.Summary:
Vampirella of Drakulon: Vampirella meets astronauts who have crashed on her vampire planet.
The Blood Red Game: A woman who was possessed by the Blood Red Queen of Hearts tells a story of how she tried to capture Vampirella's heart.
The Movement of Blood: Vampirella learns the history of vampires in mythologies from different cultures.
Two So Different: Conrad Van Helsing reminisces about Vampirella's first meeting with Dracula.
ComicInfo.Tags: Vampires,La Llorona,Pendragon,Vampirella,Conrad Van Helsing,Dracula,Lucretia,Lilith,Lamiae,Blood Red Queen Of Hearts,Lamia
